game.title: Recover the Lost Treasure of Oakwood
game.objective: Retrieve the treasure from the lost temple and return it to the village elder.
game.description: The treasure of Oakwood has been lost for centuries, hidden deep within a treacherous jungle. The village elder has asked for your help in retrieving it.
game.reward: 500 gold coins and a magical amulet

task.objective: Find the entrance to the lost temple.
task.description: The temple is hidden behind a waterfall. Follow the river upstream to find it.

task.objective: Navigate through the temple's traps and puzzles.
task.description: The temple is filled with deadly traps and complex puzzles. Use your wits to overcome them.

task.objective: Defeat the temple's guardian and claim the treasure.
task.description: The treasure is guarded by a fearsome beast. Fight it to claim your reward.
task.location: Inner Sanctum of the Lost Temple
